title: Render
description: A unified cloud to build and run all your apps and websites with free TLS certificates, a global CDN, DDoS protection, private networks, and auto deploys from Git.

additionalInfo.content: Free web service will sleeps after 15 minutes of inactivity, so you have to actively ping it to keep it awake, for NodeJs server, consider using node-cron.

comparisonInfo.supportedLanguage: NodeJs, Python, Go, Rust, Ruby, and Elixir
